Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-53263 affecting package git-lfs for versions less than 3.6.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-53263 affecting package git-lfs for versions less than 3.6.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package git-lfs is earlier than 3.6.1-1, affected by CVE-2024-53263
